sentences.sContent: The movie earned £7 million on its first day.
sentences.sCn: 这部电影上映首日便大赚700万英镑。

sentences.sContent: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.sCn: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

synos.tran: 赚，赚得；获得，挣得；使得到；博得

trans.tranOther: to make a profit from business or from putting money in a bank etc
